app module

app.add_new_todo()[source]

Add a new TODO item.

This route adds a new TODO item to the database.

Returns:

The newly added TODO item.

app.delete_todo(uid)[source]

Delete a specific TODO item.

This route deletes a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

Returns:

Result of the delete operation.

app.get_app_db()[source]

Get the application database connection.

This function initializes the database connection if it hasn’t been initialized yet, and returns the database connection object.

Returns:

Database connection object.

app.get_todo(uid)[source]

Get a specific TODO item.

This route retrieves a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

Returns:

The TODO item with the given UID.

app.get_todos()[source]

Get all TODO items.

This route retrieves all TODO items from the database.

Returns:

List of TODO items.

app.get_users_db()[source]

Get the users database connection.

This function initializes the users database connection if it hasn’t been initialized yet, and returns the database connection object.

Returns:

Users database connection object.

app.login()[source]

User login route.

This route handles user login and returns a JWT token if the credentials are valid.

Returns:

JWT token.

app.update_todo(uid)[source]

Update a specific TODO item.

This route updates a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

Returns:

Result of the update operation.
